entry.title: Eltoo in a tree
entry.summary: The provided context talks about an idea for optimization on Eltoo. The idea is discussed in a forum post on bitcointalk.org. Unfortunately, the link to the post is broken and cannot be accessed. However, it can be assumed that the post discusses a potential improvement or enhancement to the Eltoo protocol.The context also includes a non-text attachment called "signature.asc". This is likely a digital signature that confirms the authenticity of the message being sent. Without access to the actual forum post, it is impossible to provide further details or insights into the proposed optimization on Eltoo.
